children.name: training_frame
children.info: Id of the training data frame (Not required, to allow initial validation of model parameters).

children.name: validation_frame
children.info: Id of the validation data frame.

children.name: nfolds
children.info: Number of folds for N-fold cross-validation (0 to disable or >= 2).

children.name: response_column
children.info: Response variable column.

children.name: ignored_columns
children.info: A list of columns ignoted from the source data frame

children.name: ignore_const_cols
children.info: Enable/Disable - Ignore constant columns.

children.name: hidden
children.info: Hidden layer sizes (e.g. [100, 100]) or (e.g. [100,100,100])

children.name: epochs
children.info: How many times the dataset should be iterated (streamed), can be fractional.

children.name: variable_importances
children.info: Compute variable importances for input features (Gedeon method) - can be slow for large networks.

children.name: fold_assignment
children.info: Cross-validation fold assignment scheme, if fold_column is not specified. The 'Stratified' option will stratify the folds based on the response variable, for classification problems.

children.name: fold_column
children.info: Column with cross-validation fold index assignment per observation.

children.name: score_each_iteration
children.info: Enable/Disable - Whether to score during each iteration of model training.

children.name: weights_column
children.info: Column with observation weights. Giving some observation a weight of zero is equivalent to excluding it from the dataset; giving an observation a relative weight of 2 is equivalent to repeating that row twice. Negative weights are not allowed.

children.name: offset_column
children.info: Offset column. This will be added to the combination of columns before applying the link function.

children.name: balance_classes
children.info: Enable/Disable - Balance training data class counts via over/under-sampling (for imbalanced data).

children.name: max_confusion_matrix_size
children.info: Maximum size (# classes) for confusion matrices to be printed in the Logs.

children.name: max_hit_ratio_k
children.info: Max. number (top K) of predictions to use for hit ratio computation (for multi-class only, 0 to disable).

children.name: checkpoint
children.info: Model checkpoint to resume training with.

children.name: standardize
children.info: Enable/Disable - If enabled, automatically standardize the data. If disabled, the user must provide properly scaled input data.

children.name: train_samples_per_iteration
children.info: Number of training samples (globally) per MapReduce iteration. Special values are 0: one epoch, -1: all available data (e.g., replicated training data), -2: automatic.

children.name: adaptive_rate
children.info: Enable/Disable - 	Adaptive learning rate.

children.name: input_dropout_ratio
children.info: [0.1/0.2] - Input layer dropout ratio (can improve generalization, try 0.1 or 0.2).

children.name: hidden_dropout_ratios
children.info: Hidden layer dropout ratios (can improve generalization), specify one value per hidden layer, defaults to 0.5.

children.name: L1
children.info: L1 regularization (can add stability and improve generalization, causes many weights to become 0).

children.name: L2
children.info: L2 regularization (can add stability and improve generalization, causes many weights to be small.

children.name: quantile_alpha
children.info: Desired quantile for Quantile regression, must be between 0 and 1.

children.name: tweedie_power
children.info: Tweedie power for Tweedie regression, must be between 1 and 2.

children.name: huber_alpha
children.info: Desired quantile for Huber/M-regression (threshold between quadratic and linear loss, must be between 0 and 1).

children.name: score_interval
children.info: Shortest time interval (in seconds) between model scoring.

children.name: score_training_samples
children.info: Number of training set samples for scoring (0 for all).

children.name: score_validation_samples
children.info: Number of validation set samples for scoring (0 for all).

children.name: score_duty_cycle
children.info: Maximum duty cycle fraction for scoring (lower: more training, higher: more scoring).

children.name: stopping_rounds
children.info: Early stopping based on convergence of stopping_metric. Stop if simple moving average of length k of the stopping_metric does not improve for k:=stopping_rounds scoring events (0 to disable)

children.name: stopping_metric
children.info: Metric to use for early stopping (AUTO: logloss for classification, deviance for regression)

children.name: stopping_tolerance
children.info: Relative tolerance for metric-based stopping criterion (stop if relative improvement is not at least this much)

children.name: max_runtime_secs
children.info: Maximum allowed runtime in seconds for model training. Use 0 to disable.

children.name: autoencoder
children.info: Enable/Disable - Auto-Encoder.

children.name: categorical_encoding
children.info: Encoding scheme for categorical features
